body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                 News   Boston National Historical Park wants to help you stay connected to what is happening in the park.          Photos & Multimedia   Experience the park from afar. Check out our photos, videos and more.          History & Culture   The 43 acres of Boston National Historical Park encompasses over 350 years of history.
